Title: Provides the temporary president of the senate and the speaker of the assembly the ability to appoint members of the state university of New York's board of trustees
Summary: Provides the temporary president of the senate and the speaker of the assembly the ability to appoint four members each of the state university of New York's board of trustees; reduces the members of such board the governor appoints to seven.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing the temporary president of the senate and the speaker of the assembly the ability to appoint members of the state university of New York's board of trustees
